blocks.content: Define an opposite group, which is the same as the original group but with addition written the other way around. ~ df-oppr does the same thing for multiplication. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: oppgval
blocks.content: Value of the opposite group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Fan Zheng, 26-Jun-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppgval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(coppg, c1))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2))), cfv(coppg, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(coppg, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, coppg, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2))), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)))), c1, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  opeq2d(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0))), ctpos(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  tposeqd(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cplusg)
  df-oppg(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(coppg, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, coppg)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2)))
  reldmsets()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c2))))
}

thm oppgval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(oppG ` c1)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), (oppG ` c1))
  pm2.61i((oppG ` c1)=(c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, coppg, (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), (hs0[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos((+ ` hs0))>))
  oveq12d(hs0, csts, <(+ ` ndx), tpos((+ ` hs0))>, c1, <(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>, hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  opeq2d((+ ` ndx), tpos((+ ` hs0)), tpos(c2), hs0 = c1)
  tposeqd((+ ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c2, (+ ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cplusg)
  df-oppg(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, <(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>)
  eqtr4d((oppG ` c1), (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c1, coppg)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, <(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>)
  reldmsets()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c2)>))
}

blocks.name: oppgplusfval
blocks.content: Value of the addition operation of an opposite group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Fan Zheng, 26-Jun-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppgplusfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, ctpos(c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(coppg, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c3))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, ctpos(c1), cfv(cplusg, c3))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), ctpos(c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl6reqr(cfv(cplusg, c3), ctpos(c1), cfv(cplusg, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c1)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(ctpos(c1), cfv(cplusg, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c1))))), wcel(ctpos(c1), universe))
  tposex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cplusg, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, ctpos(c1), universe, cplusg)
  fveq2i(cplusg, c3, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c1))))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cplusg, c3), ctpos(c1), cfv(cplusg, emptycls), ctpos(emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  eqtr2i(cfv(cplusg, emptycls), ctpos(emptycls), emptycls)
  tpos0()
  str0(cplusg, cfv(cplusg, cnx))
  plusgid()
  fveq2d(cplusg, c3, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c3, emptycls, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c1))), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  oppgval(c3, c2, c1)
  ovprc1(c2, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(c1)))
  reldmsets()
  tposeqd(c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cplusg, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cplusg)
}

thm oppgplusfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = tpos(c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(oppG ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(+ ` c3)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, tpos(c1), (+ ` c3))
  pm2.61i((+ ` c3)= tpos(c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6reqr((+ ` c3), tpos(c1), (+ `(c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c1)>)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpan2(c2 ‚àà ùïå, tpos(c1)=(+ `(c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c1)>)), tpos(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  tposex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cplusg, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, tpos(c1), universe, cplusg)
  fveq2i(cplusg, c3, (c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c1)>))
  3eqtr4a((+ ` c3), tpos(c1), (+ ` ‚àÖ), tpos(‚àÖ), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqtr2i((+ ` ‚àÖ), tpos(‚àÖ), emptycls)
  tpos0()
  str0(cplusg, (+ ` ndx))
  plusgid()
  fveq2d(cplusg, c3, emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c3, emptycls, (c2[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos(c1)>), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  oppgval(c3, c2, c1)
  ovprc1(c2, csts, <(+ ` ndx), tpos(c1)>)
  reldmsets()
  tposeqd(c1, emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (+ ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cplusg)
}

blocks.name: oppglem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ oppgbas . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppglem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(coppg, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cslot(c3))
  -| wcel(c3, cn)
  -| wne(c3, nat2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, c1))))))
  setsnid(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  mpbir(wne(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cplusg, cnx)), wne(c3, nat2))
  neeq12i(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3, nat2)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  plusgndx()
  fveq2i(c0, c2, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cplusg, c1)))))
  oppgval(c2, c1, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oppglem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(oppG ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 = Slot(c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚â† 2
} = {
  eqtr4i((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos((+ ` c1))>)))
  setsnid(c0, c1, (+ ` ndx), tpos((+ ` c1)))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  mpbir((c0 ` ndx)‚â†(+ ` ndx), c3 ‚â† 2)
  neeq12i((c0 ` ndx), (+ ` ndx), c3, nat2)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  plusgndx()
  fveq2i(c0, c2, (c1[sSet]<(+ ` ndx), tpos((+ ` c1))>))
  oppgval(c2, c1, (+ ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
}

thm oppgmnd(class c0, class c1) {

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c0))
} = {
  ismndd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c0), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cmnd), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  oppgbas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  eqidd(cfv(cplusg, c1), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  syl5eqel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mndcl(c0, cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  3eqtr4g(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), co(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  eqcomd(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), co(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cmnd), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mndass(c0, cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqtri(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), co(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2)))
  oveq1i(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))
  oppgplus(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)
  oppgplus(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)
  eqtri(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))
  oveq2i(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)))
  oppgplus(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)
  oppgplus(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)

  syl5eq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  oppgplus(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)
  mndrid(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl5eq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(hs0), co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  oppgplus(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  mndlid(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cmnd))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cmnd))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(c0, cmnd))
}

thm oppgmnd(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(oppG ` c0)
} = {
  ismndd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c1), (0 ` c0), c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Mnd, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  oppgbas((Base ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqidd((+ ` c1), c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  syl5eqel((hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), (Base ` c0), (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  3com23(c0 ‚àà Mnd, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  mndcl(c0, hs1, (Base ` c0), hs0, (+ ` c0))
  3eqtr4g(((hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)[(+ ` c1)]hs2), (hs0[(+ ` c1)](hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs2)), (hs2[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), ((hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))))
  eqcomd((hs2[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), ((hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))), ((hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs0)=(hs2[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), c0 ‚àà Mnd, hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Mnd, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  simpr2(c0 ‚àà Mnd, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà Mnd, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  mndass(c0, hs2, (Base ` c0), hs1, hs0, (+ ` c0))
  eqtri(((hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)[(+ ` c1)]hs2), (hs2[(+ ` c0)](hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), ((hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)[(+ ` c1)]hs2))
  oveq1i((hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), (+ ` c1), hs2, (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))
  oppgplus(hs0, (+ ` c1), hs1, (+ ` c0), c0, c1)
  oppgplus((hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (+ ` c1), hs2, (+ ` c0), c0, c1)
  eqtri((hs0[(+ ` c1)](hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs2)), ((hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1)[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)](hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1)))
  oveq2i(hs0, (+ ` c1), (hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs2), (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1))
  oppgplus(hs1, (+ ` c1), hs2, (+ ` c0), c0, c1)
  oppgplus(hs0, (+ ` c1), (hs2[(+ ` c0)]hs1), (+ ` c0), c0, c1)
  mndidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  syl5eq(((0 ` c0)[(+ ` c1)]hs0), hs0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))

blocks.name: oppgcntz
blocks.content: A centralizer in a group is the same as the centralizer in the opposite group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)

  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs1, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs1, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))))
  ralbii(hs1, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))

  eqcom(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq12i(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs1)))
  oppgplus(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), c3, c2)
  oppgplus(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c3, c2)

  simprd(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))
  cntzrcl(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c3, cfv(cbs, c3))
  elcntz(hs1, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cplusg, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  biadanii(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs1, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))
  simprd(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c2, universe))
  cntzrcl(cv(hs0), cfv(ccntz, c2), c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  elcntz(hs1, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), cv(hs0), cfv(ccntz, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2), c2)
  oppgbas(cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)=((Cntz ` c2)` c1)

  ralbii(hs1, c1, (hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs0), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0))
  bitr4i((hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs0), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0), (hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs0)=(hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1))
  eqcom((hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1), (hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs0))
  eqeq12i((hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1), (hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0), (hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs0), (hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1))

  biadanii(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ` c1), c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0[(+ ` c3)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c3)]hs0))))

  simprd(hs0 ‚àà((Cntz ` c2)` c1), c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3), c2 ‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: oppgcntr
blocks.content: The center of a group is the same as the center of the opposite group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppgcntr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(ccntr, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ccntr, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr3i(c0, cfv(ccntr, c1), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  oppgcntz(cfv(ccntz, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c2)
  eqtr4i(cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)), c0, cfv(ccntr, c2))
  cntrval(cfv(ccntz, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))
  cntrval(cfv(ccntz, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), c1)
  oppgbas(cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:

  ‚ä¢ c0 =(Cntr ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(oppG ` c2)

} = {
  3eqtr3i(c0, (Cntr ` c1), ((Cntz ` c2)`(Base ` c2)), ((Cntz ` c1)`(Base ` c2)))
  oppgcntz((Cntz ` c2), (Base ` c2), c1, c2)
  eqtr4i(((Cntz ` c2)`(Base ` c2)), c0, (Cntr ` c2))
  cntrval((Cntz ` c2), (Base ` c2), c2)
  eqid((Cntz ` c2))
  cntrval((Cntz ` c1), (Base ` c2), c1)
  oppgbas((Base ` c2), c1, c2)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((Cntz ` c1))
}
